Class FigureColoree

  • java.lang.Object
    • modele.FigureColoree

    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cercle, Ligne, Polygone

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    class abstraite qui modélise une figure
